about_the_game:
About the game.

Get ready for a night of pure terror as you step into the shoes of Steve, a security guard on his first shift at a hospital filled with dark secrets. While monitoring the security cameras, you’ll encounter strange anomalies that you must investigate and fix, but not everything is as it seems. With each step, you’ll get closer to uncovering the hospital's dark past and the mystery surrounding your daughter.

Use the cameras to track supernatural events in real-time.

When something goes wrong, act fast: head to the location of the anomaly, investigate, and find a way to fix it before it's too late.

Explore the darkest corners of the hospital as you uncover forgotten memories and piece together the truth about your daughter, all while trapped in an oppressive atmosphere where every shadow could be deadly.

But remember, you're not alone. Something watches from the shadows. And worse, the nightmares lurking in this hospital are not mere illusions.

Features.

  • Immersive experience: Atmospheric and photorealistic graphics that intensify the horror experience.

  • Gameplay: The game is a walking simulator with anomaly detection mechanics. Unlike other games, you'll have to personally fix the anomalies.

  • Psychological horror: The game will try to deceive and scare you.

  • From the Other Side is a short game lasting between 60 and 90 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This video game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: "From the Other Side" immerses you in a chilling first-person psychological horror game. You are Steve, a security guard on his first night at work, tasked with monitoring security cameras and fixing unsettling anomalies that will make you question reality.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German
